choose.when: FID, FCONF_TYPE, FCONF_CODE, FCONF_NAME, FVERSION, FCONTENT, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK

mapper.select:
select
from ect_sys_config
order by
${item.field}
desc
mapper.delete: delete from ect_sys_config where FID in (#{listItem})
mapper.insert: insert into ect_sys_config (FID, FCONF_TYPE, FCONF_CODE, FCONF_NAME, FVERSION, FCONTENT, FENABLE, FAUDIT_STATE, FDELETE_STATE, FEDIT_STATE, FAUDITOR_ID, FAUDIT_TIME, FCREATOR_ID, FCREATE_TIME, FDELETOR_ID, FDELETE_TIME, FEDITOR_ID, FEDIT_TIME, FREMARK ) values ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{confName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

FID,
FCONF_TYPE,

FVERSION,

mapper.update:
update ect_sys_config
FCONF_TYPE = #{data.confType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONF_CODE = #{data.confCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONF_NAME = #{data.confName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FVERSION = #{data.version, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTENT = #{data.content, jdbcType=CLOB},
FENABLE = #{data.enable, jdbcType=BIT},
FAUDIT_STATE = #{data.auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FDELETE_STATE = #{data.deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FEDIT_STATE = #{data.editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FAUDITOR_ID = #{data.auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAUDIT_TIME = #{data.auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATOR_ID = #{data.creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCREATE_TIME = #{data.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FDELETOR_ID = #{data.deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDELETE_TIME = #{data.deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FEDITOR_ID = #{data.editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEDIT_TIME = #{data.editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FREMARK = #{data.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ect_sys_config set FCONF_TYPE = #{data.confType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONF_CODE = #{data.confCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONF_NAME = #{data.confName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FVERSION = #{data.version, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTENT = #{data.content, jdbcType=CLOB}, FENABLE = #{data.enable, jdbcType=BIT}, FAUDIT_STATE = #{data.auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FDELETE_STATE = #{data.deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FEDIT_STATE = #{data.editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FAUDITOR_ID = #{data.auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDIT_TIME = #{data.auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATOR_ID = #{data.creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATE_TIME = #{data.createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDELETOR_ID = #{data.deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDELETE_TIME = #{data.deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEDITOR_ID = #{data.editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEDIT_TIME = #{data.editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FREMARK = #{data.remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ect_sys_config
FCONF_TYPE = #{confType, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONF_CODE = #{confCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONF_NAME = #{confName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FVERSION = #{version, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONTENT = #{content, jdbcType=CLOB},
FENABLE = #{enable, jdbcType=BIT},
FAUDIT_STATE = #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FDELETE_STATE = #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FEDIT_STATE = #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT},
FAUDITOR_ID = #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FCREATOR_ID = #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCREATE_TIME = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FDELETOR_ID = #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FDELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FEDITOR_ID = #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FEDIT_TIME = #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FREMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ect_sys_config set
FCONF_TYPE = #{confType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONF_CODE = #{confCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONF_NAME = #{confName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FVERSION = #{version, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCONTENT = #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, FENABLE = #{enable, jdbcType=BIT}, FAUDIT_STATE = #{auditState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FDELETE_STATE = #{deleteState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FEDIT_STATE = #{editState, jdbcType=SMALLINT}, FAUDITOR_ID = #{auditorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAUDIT_TIME = #{auditTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FCREATOR_ID = #{creatorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FCREATE_TIME = #{createTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FDELETOR_ID = #{deletorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FDELETE_TIME = #{deleteTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FEDITOR_ID = #{editorId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEDIT_TIME = #{editTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FREMARK = #{remark, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
